channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Mediana for POP TV, 25 March 2018 – Seat Projections
item.description:
• Slovenska demokratska stranka (EPP): 1–3 seats
  • Stranka modernega centra (ALDE): 1 seats
  • Socialni demokrati (S&D): 1–2 seats
  • Levica (GUE/NGL): 0–1 seats
  • Nova Slovenija–Krščanski demokrati (EPP): 0–1 seats
  • Demokratična stranka upokojencev Slovenije (ALDE): 0–1 seats
  • Stranka Alenke Bratušek (ALDE): 0 seats
  • Slovenska ljudska stranka (EPP): 0 seats
  • Slovenska nacionalna stranka (*): 0 seats
  • Glas za otroke in družine–Nova ljudska stranka Slovenije (*): 0 seats
  • Lista Marjana Šarca (*): 2–3 seats
  • Pozitivna Slovenija (*): 0 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Mediana for POP TV, 25 March 2018 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by Mediana for POP TV, 25 March 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Slovenska demokratska stranka (EPP): 15.5–22.9%
  • Stranka modernega centra (ALDE): 7.8–13.5%
  • Socialni demokrati (S&D): 12.4–19.2%
  • Levica (GUE/NGL): 5.2–10.1%
  • Nova Slovenija–Krščanski demokrati (EPP): 4.6–9.4%
  • Demokratična stranka upokojencev Slovenije (ALDE): 3.9–8.3%
  • Stranka Alenke Bratušek (ALDE): 1.9–5.3%
  • Slovenska ljudska stranka (EPP): 0.5–2.7%
  • Slovenska nacionalna stranka (*): 1.3–4.2%
  • Glas za otroke in družine–Nova ljudska stranka Slovenije (*): 0.9–3.6%
  • Lista Marjana Šarca (*): 21.7–29.9%
  • Pozitivna Slovenija (*): 0.4–2.3%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Ninamedia for RTV Slovenija–Dnevnik, 13–15 March 2018 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by Ninamedia for RTV Slovenija–Dnevnik, 13–15 March 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Slovenska demokratska stranka (EPP): 15.7–23.2%

  • Socialni demokrati (S&D): 17.2–24.9%
  • Levica (GUE/NGL): 4.0–8.5%
  • Nova Slovenija–Krščanski demokrati (EPP): 5.7–10.9%
  • Demokratična stranka upokojencev Slovenije (ALDE): 5.7–10.9%
  • Stranka Alenke Bratušek (ALDE): 0.0–1.3%
  • Lista Marjana Šarca (*): 16.8–24.4%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Parsifal SC for Nova24TV, 10–14 March 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:

  • Stranka modernega centra (ALDE): 3.9–7.0%
  • Socialni demokrati (S&D): 14.0–19.2%
  • Levica (GUE/NGL): 2.9–5.7%
  • Nova Slovenija–Krščanski demokrati (EPP): 5.2–8.7%
  • Demokratična stranka upokojencev Slovenije (ALDE): 4.8–8.2%
  • Stranka Alenke Bratušek (ALDE): 0.9–2.7%
  • Slovenska ljudska stranka (EPP): 1.9–4.2%
  • Slovenska nacionalna stranka (*): 3.9–7.0%
  • Glas za otroke in družine–Nova ljudska stranka Slovenije (*): 0.3–1.5%
  • Lista Marjana Šarca (*): 18.2–23.9%
